title.rendered: Vision Media Opens Beta for its New Free Secure Screening Offering

content.rendered:
Vision Media, entertainment’s trusted partner

Vision Media opens beta for new secure screening offering

Vision Media opens its free plan to ensure that creators of all sizes can share video securely, collaborate internally, and enjoy powerful screener tools.

Vision Media is excited to offer free secure screening and increase access for more independent studios, SMBs, and content owners to share their films, TV episodes, and creative stories.”

— Tim Shanahan, Vision Media CEO

LOS ANGELES, CA, USA, April 17, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Vision Media, entertainment’s trusted streaming, awards, and fulfillment partner, announced today that it is debuting a new free secure screening offering. With 36+ years of experience building solutions for the entertainment industry to share their content, Vision Media is proud to open beta for its new free Starter Plan. Recognizing that finding a quality screener solution can often be cost-prohibitive for independents, smaller organizations, and more, Vision Media wanted to offer a solution to help creatives of all sizes share their movies, TV shows, and media.

Vision Media is known for its secure streaming solutions that allow users to share videos with their team or audience. Over the past few decades, the company has evolved to a digital-first company, offering secure digital streaming for major studios and promotion services approved by all major entertainment guilds and groups. Its cutting-edge digital solutions (including Screener Passport, self-serve streaming services with VMxStream, and FYC and guild sites with VMxAwards) allow studios and content owners to offer high-end viewing experiences across all major viewing platforms with first-class screening security features including DRM, session-based watermarking, and protected viewing windows.

Now those that are interested in sharing their video content with studio-grade tools, can benefit from Vision Media’s streaming expertise, with a plan that allows them to grow. As part of the company’s digital-first commitment, Vision Media is opening up this free offering to ensure that content owners, producers and creators of all sizes can share securely, collaborate internally, and enjoy the powerful tools that the largest media and entertainment leaders also use.

“Vision Media is excited to offer free secure screening and increase access for more independent studios, SMBs, and content owners to share their films, TV episodes, and creative stories.” said Vision Media CEO, Tim Shanahan. “It is important to us to not only continue to serve established studios and guilds with our best-in-class screener solutions, but to provide a path for all creators to amplify their voice and share their content with tools they can trust.”

Vision Media’s free VMxStream Starter Plan allows users to brand screening rooms to match their look and feel, add and import metadata directly from IMDb, secure their videos with unique, visible watermarking, and share with their viewers.

Beta is now open and individuals can request exclusive access to this new free secure screener offering at www.visionmedia.com/beta.

About Vision Media

Vision Media is a proud and trusted partner of M&E leaders​ helping orchestrate, execute and amplify brands and ​content to audiences and partners around the world. With 36+ years of experience in the entertainment industry, Vision Media serves major motion picture film studios, entertainment guilds, distributors and content owners. Its VMx (Vision Media Experience) product suite includes best-in-class secure screening, awards expertise, and managed services. Vision Media’s highly secure, streaming digital platform, which has been vetted and certified by the most discerning film companies and guild executives in the business, has credentialed the company as a best-in-class trusted partner in delivering premium streaming content to VIPs. For more information, please visit www.visionmedia.com.

Joanna Syiek
Vision Media
+1 661-702-5000
joanna.syiek@visionmedia.com
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Twitter
LinkedIn
Instagram

News Provided By

April 17, 2023, 12:00 GMT
